item.title: What I Said To My Team During COVID-19
item.description: Hey all. With everything that is going on, I want to be explicit with you all about how we work in this new reality. All this is not normal. This is not a regular work week but from home, this is something harder. We are still learning how to operate in this new reality, we will make mistakes at the start, and we will get better at it in time.
